value.title: Microsoft Azure OpenAI lets enterprises feed corporate secrets to ChatGPT
value.excerpt: ChatGPT, which was introduced to Azure OpenAI Service in May, by default keeps records of all conversations, including queries and AI responses. Remember that when feeding it internal sensitive information – crooks love vacuuming up credentials to ChatGPT accounts and thus access to any chat histories.
